meaning_str.bing:
n. 游泳；游泳运动
v. “swim”的现在分词
网络. 游水；正在游泳；泅水

眩晕的；游泳的；会游泳的；经常游泳的；适于游泳者的；浸满水的；浸满水似的；充满水似的；水汪汪的
游泳；游；游动；浸泡；使浸泡；泡；（swim的现在分词）

1.en: True, Kapalua Beach is only one of a thousand Hawaiian beaches. However, it is one of the best for swimming.
1.cn: 是的，卡帕鲁瓦只是夏威夷上千个沙滩中的一个，却是最最适合游泳的那个。

2.en: While he has said he will crack down on cocaine production, he appears to be swimming against the current.
2.cn: 他口口声声要严厉打击可卡因生产，可自己却偏偏逆流而动。

3.en: When did you think you are most smart? : When in high school , I got a medal in swimming at National athletic meet .
3.cn: 什么时候认为自己很敏捷灵巧：当我高中的时候，我在全国游泳比赛中获得了奖牌。

0.en: Peppa and her family are at the swimming pool.
0.cn: 佩奇和家人一起去游泳。

1.en: It is George's first time at a swimming pool.
1.cn: 这次乔治第一次下水游泳。

2.en: Yeah, but in the meantime you could be swimming in it. No, not me. Don't know how.
2.cn: 但是在装修之前你还可以在这游泳啊。我不行，我不会游泳。

3.en: I'll just go for a little walk. Good morning, Mr. Pig. I see you have found the swimming pool.
3.cn: 我要去散散步。早上好，猪先生，我看你已经找到游泳池了。

4.en: I'll just go for a little walk. Ah. Good morning, Mr. Pig. I see you have found the swimming pool.
4.cn: 我要去散散步。早上好，猪先生，我看你已经找到游泳池了。

5.en: So I, volunteer at the hospital until, like, 2:00, and then I figure we can carpool to the party at the swimming hole.
5.cn: 我志愿在医院帮忙到2点，然后我们可以拼车去深水潭游泳。

6.en: You know, walking to school together, dancing on tables at bungalow, night swimming at your mom's country house.
6.cn: 一起上学，一起在平房里的桌上跳舞，晚上在你妈妈乡村别墅的泳池里游泳。

7.en: The ducks are swimming in their pond. They are very happy. Here are Peppa, George, Mummy Pig, and Daddy Pig.
7.cn: 鸭子们都在池塘里游泳。他们游得很开心。佩奇，乔治，猪爸爸，猪妈妈，都来了。

8.en: What is it to be? Car park? Swimming pool? Rocket station ? A house. Can you build it exactly like this please? But bigger.
8.cn: 你想造什么？停车场？游泳池？火箭站？一座房子！请按照这个模型造就可以了。但是要大一点。

9.en: Or, jump on a ferry to traffic-free Lamma Island and spend the day swimming, exploring villages, and hiking its many trails.
9.cn: 又或者乘搭小轮到清幽的南丫岛，在那里游游泳、看看村庄、行行山，都已经可以花您一整天时间了。

10.en: So tomorrow, when they come home, instead of swimming and all the other little stuff that they want to do, they're going to do their chores. Right?
10.cn: 所以明天，他们回来以后就不应该去游泳或者玩其它想玩的东西，而是必须先做完家务，对不对？

11.en: Hello, Mr. Pig. What is it to be? Car park? Swimming pool? Rocket station ? A house. Can you build it exactly like this please? But bigger.
11.cn: 你好，猪先生！你想造什么？停车场？游泳池？火箭站？一座房子！请按照这个模型造就可以了。但是要大一点。

12.en: It was built by captain Francis Fowke in 1896. He also designed the museum of natural history. It was purely a fan of big, overbearing swimming pool.
12.cn: 这是弗兰西斯·福克船长1896年建造的，他还设计了自然历史博物馆。这简直像是一个巨大的游泳池。

13.en: Nah, I can't. I got to pick up my mom from her water aerobics class. 18 overweight women flapping their arm fat in a swimming pool. Looks like the manatee tank at Sea World.
13.cn: 我不行，我要去水中有氧运动班接我妈。十八个超重妇女在游泳池里甩着肥大的手臂，就像海洋世界里的海牛。

14.en: Big children don't splash. We are very good at swimming. When George and Richard are older, they'll be able to swim like us, won't they, Rebecca? Yes.
14.cn: 我们都不会有那么大的水花。我们游泳游得特别好。等乔治和理查德大一些，他们也会游得像我们那么好。对不对呀，瑞贝卡？没错。

15.en: Oh, my gosh! Nemo's swimming out to sea!
15.cn: 噢，糟了！尼莫正在游向海面！

16.en: He's swimming to the filter! Shark-bait! Not again!
16.cn: 他向过滤器游去了! 鲨鱼饵! 别再这样了!

17.en: It's a big concrete swimming pool with a concrete cover.
17.cn: 这是一个有混凝土保护层的大水泥泳池。

18.en: Daddy pig is wearing his swimming costume. Mummy pig is wearing her swimming costume. Peppa is wearing her swimming costume.
18.cn: 猪爸爸穿着泳裤，猪妈妈穿着泳衣，佩奇也穿着泳衣。

19.en: Peppa and George are wearing their swimming costumes. Mummy Pig is wearing her swimming costume. And Daddy Pig is wearing his swimming costume.
19.cn: 佩佩和乔治正在穿他们的泳装！猪妈妈正在穿她的泳装。猪爸爸也在穿他的泳装！
